text.text:
Model 3

Designed to attain the highest safety ratings in every category, Model 3 achieves 220 miles of range while starting at only $35,000 before incentives.

text_854084717.text: Reserve your Model 3 today for delivery in 12 to 18 months.

text.text:
Reservation Holder Update

Model 3 deliveries are beginning in the US based on whether you are an employee, if you own a Tesla and when you placed your reservation. Reservation holders will receive an email when it’s time to place their order.

text_1867665976.text:
2017

Production begins in the US, with the Long Range Battery

Customer deliveries begin

text_1867665976_copy.text:
2018

All-Wheel Drive production begins

Production of the Standard Battery begins

International deliveries of left-hand drive vehicles begin this year

text_1700697854.text: Be the first to receive the latest Tesla news, events and product updates.

text_264596390.text:
Model S & Model 3

Model S is our flagship, premium sedan with more range, acceleration, displays and customization options. It’s the safest car in its class with unlimited Supercharging for the duration of ownership when referred by an owner.

Model 3 is a smaller, simpler, more affordable electric car. Although it is our newest vehicle, Model 3 is not “Version 3” or the most advanced Tesla. Like Model S, it is designed to be the safest car in its class.

text_1737882774.text:
7 - 14 days

New Model S inventory cars are available for delivery in approximately 7-14 days while custom orders are delivered in 30-60 days.

text_726919393.text:
12 - 18 months

As we ramp production, deliveries for Model 3 reservations placed today will begin in late 2018.

text_1737882774_copy_314364980.text:
Free Unlimited Supercharging

(for life of ownership, with referral)

text_1737882774_copy_288206947.text:
30 cu ft

Front & Rear Trunk Cargo Volume with Power liftgate

text_726919393_copy__1496450401.text:
15 cu ft

Front & Rear Trunk Cargo Volume with Manual Trunk

text_665231219.text:
Safety

  • Automatic emergency braking and collision avoidance
  • Eight airbags
  • Electronic stability and traction control

Convenience

  • 15″ touchscreen with onboard maps & navigation
  • Wi-Fi and LTE internet connectivity
  • Keyless entry and remote climate control with app
  • Voice activated controls
  • 60/40 split folding rear seats

Standard Interior

  • 15” touchscreen display
  • Dual zone climate control system
  • FM/Internet streaming radio
  • Textile seating
  • Center console with open storage and two USB ports

Premium Upgrades

  • Premium heated seating and cabin materials throughout, including open pore wood décor and two rear USBs
  • 12-way, power adjustable front seats, steering column and side mirrors, with custom driver profiles
  • Premium audio system with more power, tweeters, surround speakers and subwoofer
  • Tinted glass roof with ultraviolet and infrared protection
  • Auto dimming, power folding, heated side mirrors
  • LED fog lamps
  • Center console with covered storage and docking for two smartphones

    Warranty

  • 4 year, 50,000 mile limited vehicle warranty
  • 8 year, 100,000 mile battery warranty (Standard)
  • 8 year, 120,000 mile battery warranty (Long Range)
